text: Charles Boyer (August 28, 1899 in Figeac, France- August 26, 1978 in Phoenix, Arizona), was a French-American actor. He appeared in Gaslight and Algiers and may other films. He became a US Citizen on June 15, 1942 in Los Angeles. Category:1899 births Category:1978 deaths Category:Naturalized citizens of the United States Category:Actors from Phoenix, Arizona
title: Charles Boyer
